# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is truly exceptional. It's designed to meet your needs and enhance your experience in ways that are unique and valuable. Given its quality and functionality, we're confident it will be a great addition to your collection. We're offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $99. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a discounted rate. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $99. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $99
(2) Reject Alice's offer
